alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Towner, eastern Cavalier, northeastern Ramsey, northwestern Walsh and northern Pembina Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout and nickel size hail along a line extending from near Neche to Garske. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Langdon, Cavalier, Walhalla, Pembina, Neche, Edmore and Osnabrock. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 208 and 217. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Cavalier; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County
